data.comment: The match is underway in Saint Etienne.
Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Angers in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Jerome Miguelgorry awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Saint-Etienne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 5, Jerome Miguelgorry signals a throw-in for Angers, close to Saint-Etienne's area.
Throw-in Angers.
Free kick Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in the half of Angers.
Angers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Saint-Etienne have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Angers in their own half.
Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Saint Etienne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 10, Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
Goal kick for Saint-Etienne at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Jerome Miguelgorry awards Angers a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Can Saint-Etienne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Angers's half?
Angers needs to be cautious. Saint-Etienne have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Angers at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
In the minute 14, Ball goes out of play for a Saint-Etienne goal kick.
Angers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Saint-Etienne to take a throw-in in Angers territory.
In the minute 18, In Saint Etienne, Saint-Etienne push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Saint-Etienne are coming forward and Ryad Boudebouz gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Angers have a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Angers.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in the half of Angers.
In the minute 25, Romain Hamouma (Saint-Etienne) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Etienne.
Saint-Etienne push forward at Stade Geoffroy Guichard and Mathieu Debuchy gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Angers defence.
In the minute 26, Goal kick for Angers at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Throw-in Saint-Etienne.
Jimmy Cabot for Angers drives towards goal at Stade Geoffroy Guichard. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 30, Angers have been awarded a corner by Jerome Miguelgorry.
Important block from the Saint-Etienne defence as Mathias Pereira Lage fires in a strike for Angers.
Corner awarded to Angers.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Angers close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Angers in their own half.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a Angers throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half.
In the minute 33, Jerome Miguelgorry awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Angers capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Mathieu Debuchy (Saint-Etienne) has received a yellow card from Jerome Miguelgorry.
In the minute 35, Mathias Pereira Lage gets his shot on target but fails to score for Angers.
Ball safe as Saint-Etienne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Saint-Etienne's Ryad Boudebouz gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Angers defender.
In the minute 36, Saint-Etienne are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Can Angers capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint-Etienne's half?
Throw-in for Angers at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Angers.
In the minute 39, Harold Moukoudi for Saint-Etienne has been booked by Jerome Miguelgorry and receives a first yellow card.
Angers have been awarded a corner by Jerome Miguelgorry.
In the minute 41, Angers drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Saint-Etienne have a goal kick.
Jessy Moulin (Saint-Etienne) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 42, Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
In Saint Etienne Angers drive forward through Mathias Pereira Lage. His shot is on target but it's saved.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Angers push forward at Stade Geoffroy Guichard and Angelo Fulgini gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Saint-Etienne defence.
Angers have been awarded a corner by Jerome Miguelgorry.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Angers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Angers in their own half.
Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Angers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 50, Throw-in Saint-Etienne.
Throw-in high up the field for Angers in Saint Etienne.
Saint-Etienne needs to be cautious. Angers have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 53, Jerome Miguelgorry awards the home team a throw-in.
Saint-Etienne have a dangerous throw-in.
In Saint Etienne Saint-Etienne attack through Denis Bouanga. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 54, It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Etienne.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a throw-in for Saint-Etienne, close to Angers's area.
Angers to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
In the minute 58, Angers's Romain Thomas breaks free at Stade Geoffroy Guichard. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Jerome Miguelgorry awards Saint-Etienne a goal kick.
Yvan Neyou of Saint-Etienne smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 59, Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
Harold Moukoudi (Saint-Etienne) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Angers goal kick.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 60, Claude Puel is making the team's first substitution at Stade Geoffroy Guichard with Wahbi Khazri replacing Arnaud Nordin.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
In the minute 63, Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Jerome Miguelgorry.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Paul Bernardoni for Angers who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Throw-in high up the field for Saint-Etienne in Saint Etienne.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Angers's Paul Bernardoni is back in action after a slight knock.
Free kick for Angers in their own half.
In the minute 66, Saint-Etienne's Mahdi Camara has been booked in Saint Etienne.
Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
In Saint Etienne, Kolo (Saint-Etienne) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 68, Ball goes out of play for a Angers goal kick.
Angers make their first substitution with Farid El Melali replacing Jimmy Cabot.
Jerome Miguelgorry awards Saint-Etienne a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Angers are pushing forward but Stephane Bahoken's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Saint-Etienne at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 70, Jerome Miguelgorry awards the away team a throw-in.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a Angers throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 74, The home team have replaced Ryad Boudebouz with Adil Aouchiche. This is the third substitution made today by Claude Puel.
Charles Abi is replacing Romain Hamouma for Saint-Etienne at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Mohamed Ali Cho is replacing Mathias Pereira Lage for the away team.
In the minute 74, Lois Diony is on a sub for Stephane Bahoken for Angers.
Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
Throw-in for Angers in the half of Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in the half of Angers.
Can Saint-Etienne capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Angers's half?
Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Saint-Etienne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 81, Free kick Saint-Etienne.
Free kick for Angers in their own half.
In Saint Etienne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Stephane Moulin (Angers) is making a fourth substitution, with Antonin Bobichon replacing Angelo Fulgini.
In the minute 83, Stephane Moulin (Angers) is making a fifth substitution, with Pierrick Capelle replacing Thomas Mangani.
Can Angers capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint-Etienne's half?
In the minute 85, Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In Saint Etienne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Pierrick Capelle is booked for the away team.
In the minute 87, Angers have been awarded a corner by Jerome Miguelgorry.
Angers will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Saint-Etienne.
At Stade Geoffroy Guichard, Souleyman Doumbia has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 88, The home team replace Denis Bouanga with Lucas Gourna Douath.
The home team replace Mahdi Camara with Maxence Rivera.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Angers in their own half.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 0-0.
Farid El Melali for Angers has been booked by Jerome Miguelgorry and receives a first yellow card.
